channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Philadelphia man took an offer from T-Mobile that seemed ‘too good to be true’ — and his next bill proved his gut right
Whites-only community plotting expansion to another state as its efforts to build a ‘white nation’ continue
If Yuma loses water, America could be left with empty plates | Opinion
See GM's California Corvette Concept From Every Angle
Video showing migrant worker moved by forklift prompts action from South Korea's president
The US fertility rate reached a new low in 2024, CDC data shows
item.description: New federal data shows the fertility rate in the U.S. dropped to an all-time low in 2024 with less than 1.6 kids per woman

item.title: 3 men who went missing while fishing and swimming in Mississippi River found dead
item.description: Authorities say three men who were reported missing while fishing and swimming on a sandbar in the Mississippi River have been found dead near Memphis...

item.title: Police say waiting shooter ambushed 2 Ohio officers parked for lunch and seriously injured a third
item.description: Police say an armed man lying in wait on a dead-end street shot and wounded two Ohio officers when they parked their patrol vehicles in an undeveloped...

item.title: Man accused of attempting to assassinate Trump returns to court
item.description: A man charged with attempting to assassinate President Donald Trump last year at his Florida golf course will return to court to once again explain wh...

item.title: Air Force pauses M18 pistol use after airman's death at Wyoming base
item.description: The U.S. Air Force Global Strike Command has paused the use of a pistol after a Security Forces airman died at a Wyoming base
